name: giant loaded truck city driver
description:
Giant Loaded Truck City Driver

This game is very interesting game you have to drive heavy vehicles like truck, tracture etc..
This game is also about street racing.
Your goal is to Load the truck with cargo and deliver the goods to the end point without dropping the carriage.
Be fast be efficient you as you have limited time to deliver the goods.
This cargo simulation game is ideal for city parking games, car transporter games and city parking game lovers!
It is time based game! you have to complete your task in very short timing if your time is over then your game is over..
Smooth steering, hydraulic controls, first person driving view and heavy machinery driving all here in City Road Construction Loader.
After reached destination you have to park truck in proper way. It is real truck parking.
Then you get to drive the road roller. So be perfect in your duty as a construction driver.

Features:

Real truck simulator.
- High quality graphics.
- Realistic driving pleasure.
